long_desc: A truly immense man laughs at you, and draws his knife!
flags_raw: This has to be one of the biggest men you've ever seen.  He is
stats1_raw: a full seven feet toe to head, and weighs a good three hundred
stats2_raw: pounds -- mostly on his biceps and pectorals it appears.  An
stats3_raw: ornate scabbard slaps by his side, with the pommel of a silvered
